attributes.action: petition for MPs and PM have a pay cut! and 10% of their pension to go to the more needy
attributes.additional_details:
Truth.. parliament were ment to reveiw their wages over 4 or 5 years ago.. and yet still haven't. The public sector has been looked at and only, only part, of the private sector has been looked at and have had pay cuts prom Ised pensions demolished e.t.c.... it is disgraceful that EU leaders wer told to take cuts!!!   ..(cough cough) erm ...Take your own advise.

Sign it
to have MPs an PM take a pay cut, % of their pension to go better causes.

Trying to make the UK a better place
Yours ever so sincerely
F. esme
